Row.Text: The future Bogd Khan was born in 1869 in Lithang, Kham, in a family of a Tibetan official.[3] His father, Gonchigtseren, was an accountant at the 12th Dalai Lama's court. The boy was officially recognized as the new incarnation of the Bogd Gegen in Potala in the presence of the 13th Dalai Lama and the Panchen Lama. The new Bogd Gegen arrived in Urga, the capital of Outer Mongolia, in 1874. After this he lived only in Mongolia.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]According to one eyewitness,[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]...he did not become a puppet in the hands of the lamas but, on the contrary, took them in hand. Since his young years he wanted to restore the great Mongolian kingdom of Genghis Khan or, at least, to liberate Mongolia from the Chinese and make it self-dependent. Local princes feared him, but the masses liked him... An independent and clever first hierarch and ruler was unacceptable neither for Tibet, nor for the Chinese.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a result, from his young years the 8th Bogd Gegen was the subject of intrigues of Qing officials in Urga. Later he became the subject of propaganda campaigns organised by Mongolian Communists, which attacked him by alleging that he was a prolific poisoner, a paedophile, and a libertine, which was later repeated in belles-lettres and other non-scientific literature (e.g. James Palmer). However, analysis of documents stored in Mongolian and Russian archives does not confirm these statements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a monk, the Bogd had limited access to physical means of imposing power, though some enemies were executed for blasphemy. The Polish traveller Ferdinand Ossendowski recorded that he knew "every thought, every movement of the Princes and Khans, the slightest conspiracy against him, and the offender is usually kindly invited to Urga, from where he does not return alive. Ossendovsky's claims for his acquaintance with the Bogd Gegen were not confirmed by comparative analysis of his book and manuscripts.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Bogd Gegen lost his power when Chinese troops occupied the country in 1919. The Tusiyetu Khan Aimak's Prince Darchin Ch'in Wang was a supporter of Chinese rule while his younger brother Tsewang was a supporter of Ungern-Sternberg. When Baron Ungern's forces failed to seize Urga in late 1920, the Bogd was placed under house arrest; then he was freed and reinstated by Ungern shortly before he took Urga in 1921. After the revolution in 1921 led

Joy and peace be upon you, the great and holy Bogd Khan. Born as the reincarnation of Bogd Gegeen in 1869 AD, you would become the theoretic and sovereign centre of a revitalized and Buddhist Mongolian empire. In 1911, in the wake of the collapse of the Qing Dynasty, Mongolia would seize its opportunity to declare its autonomy. But though your efforts to seek international recognition and friendship were tireless and noble, your Khanate would be short-lived, and your reign would fall to the forces of the newly established Republic of China.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Stalwart and pious Khagan, whose faith and wisdom reaches back centuries into the past, the time to re-assert Mongolia's independence has been reborn. Can you lead your people in faith and happiness? Can you inspire the cause of those who see the nobility in the ways of the sacred and old? Can you build a civilization to stand the test of time?
Peace to you traveller, I am the Bogd Khan. I extend the hand of my people in friendship.
You will never know peace so long as you continue this violent path.
Friends of my people will come. You will see.
I offer you my hand in friendship. Will you join Mongolia in making a public Declaration of Friendship?
You are a threat to the good friends of this world.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
You have betrayed the friendship of my people. This cannot be forgiven.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Sometimes we must struggle to survive. This is our struggle.
I seek only to make peace with this world. I ask that you move your warriors to those seeking war.
Will you consider this, my friend?
Between two good friends, there should be no borders. Please, won't you agree?
As a friend, I ask you to resist buying up our lands.
My people suffer. As a friend, I ask your aide.
I am ashamed to have brought you this pain. I hope we can repair our friendship in time.
Sadly, I cannot call you a friend.
I'm afraid it cannot be done.

When a Great Prophet is spawned, Barbarian Units on the same landmass are converted to your control. Cities with a Great Prophet stationed in them convert [ICON_PEACE] Faith Per Turn to cultural border expansion.
With the birth of this Great Prophet, [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Barbarian Units[ENDCOLOR] have rallied to your cause!
This unit spawned as a Great Prophet.
+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith per [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Local Happiness in this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Shrine.

The unique Gate of Peace and Happiness replaces the Temple for Great Mongolia. Unlike the Temple, this building does not provide any intrinsic [ICON_PEACE] Faith. Instead, it yields [ICON_PEACE] Faith based on the city's [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Local Happiness. It does not require any maintenance. Ensure your cities are content to maximize the Gate's faith output.

The Winter Palace of the Bogd Khan, or the Bogd Khan Palace Museum, is a museum complex located in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. It was the Green Palace of the eighth Jebtsundamba Khutughtu, who was later proclaimed Bogd Khan, or ruler of Mongolia. Alongside being the oldest museum, it is also considered as one with the biggest collection in Mongolia. The palace is the only one left from originally four residences of the Bogd Khan.
Dummy: Gate of Peace and Happiness
Leadership bonus doubled in own borders. Points toward a Manlaibaatar is generated per Barbarian Unit converted to your ownership when a Great Prophet is spawned.

The Manlaibaatar is the unique Great General replacement for Great Mongolia. The standard [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus conferred by a Great General to nearby friendly Units is doubled within friendly borders. In addition, bonus points toward a Manlaibaatar are generated for every Barbarian Unit that converts to your ownership when a Great Prophet is spawned.

Manlaibaatar Damdinsüren was a military commander, Pan-Mongolist and diplomat. In 1911 he and other Mongolian nobility and high ranking Buddhist lamas participated in a secret congress in Ikh Khüree convened by Mongolia's religious leader, the Jebtsundamba Khutuktu, to formulate a declaration of independence from Manchu Chinese rule. Once the declaration was issued, Damdinsüren helped mobilize thousands of soldiers, seized the northern Inner Mongolian city of Hailar and offered his allegiance to the Bogd Khan.[3] Under the Bogd Khan's government he served as counselor first class of the ministry of the army and then Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs. In August 1912, his forces combined with those of Khatanbaatar Magsarjav and Ja Lama to liberate the city of Khovd in western Mongolia from Chinese occupation, for which he received the honorary title of Manlaibaatar ("Best Hero") and the princely title "beyle."
Benefits doubly from Great General bonus when in own borders.
Benefits doubly from Great General bonus when in own borders.

{TXT_KEY_UNIT_JFD_MANLAIBAATAR_CREATE_GREAT_GENERAL_DESC}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Promote this Unit into a Manlaibaatar. This action expends the stacked Great Prophet.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Unit must be at least Level 3 and stacked with a Great Prophet.[ENDCOLOR]

{TXT_KEY_UNIT_JFD_MANLAIBAATAR_CREATE_GREAT_GENERAL_DESC}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Promote this Unit into a Manlaibaatar. This action expends the stacked Great Prophet.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Unit must be at least Level 3 and stacked with a Great Prophet.[ENDCOLOR]

Cities with a Great Prophet stationed in them convert [ICON_PEACE] Faith Per Turn to cultural border expansion.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]UNIQUE UNIT: MANLAIBAATAR (GREAT GENERAL)[NEWLINE]The Manlaibaatar is the unique Great General replacement for Great Mongolia. The standard [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus conferred by a Great General to nearby friendly Units is doubled within friendly borders. In addition, bonus points toward a Manlaibaatar are generated for every Barbarian Unit that converts to your ownership when a Great Prophet is spawned.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]UNIQUE BUILDING: GATE OF PEACE AND HAPPINESS (TEMPLE)[NEWLINE]The unique Gate of Peace and Happiness replaces the Temple for Great Mongolia. Unlike the Temple, this building does not provide any intrinsic [ICON_PEACE] Faith. Instead, it yields [ICON_PEACE] Faith based on the city's [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Local Happiness. It does not require any maintenance. Ensure your cities are content to maximize the Gate's faith output.

博格達汗在1869年出生於康區理塘的一個西藏官員家庭。他的父親貢其格色仁（Gonchigtseren）是第十二世達賴喇嘛府上的會計。在十三世達賴喇嘛和班禪喇嘛的見證下，這名男孩在布達拉宮被正式認定為博格多·格根的轉世靈童。新任博格多·格根於1874年抵達外蒙古首府庫倫。他從年輕時就想恢復成吉思汗的大蒙古王國，或至少把蒙古從中國的統治下解放出來，實現自力更生。當地的王公貴族畏懼他，但群眾卻喜歡他...無論對西藏還是對中國來說，一個獨立而又聰明的第一任主教和統治者都是不可接受的。後來，他成為蒙古共產黨組織的宣傳活動的對象，他們攻擊他，說他是一個多產的投毒者、戀童癖者和浪蕩子，這些說法後來在純文學和其他非科學文獻中被重複（例如詹姆斯·帕爾默）。然而，對蒙古和俄羅斯檔案中儲存的文件的分析並未證實這些說法。波蘭旅行家費迪南德·奧森多夫斯基記錄道，他「知道王子和可汗的每一個想法、每一個動作，以及針對他的最輕微的陰謀，而罪犯通常會被熱情地邀請到庫倫，從那裡他不會活著回來。」奧森多夫斯基聲稱他認識博格多·格根，但對他的書和部落格手稿的比較土司耶圖汗艾瑪克的王子達爾欽·欽旺是中國統治的支持者，而他的弟弟則旺是恩琴-施滕伯格的支持者。
第八世哲布尊丹巴呼圖克圖

願歡樂與平安降臨於您，偉大而神聖的博克多格根額真汗！您於公元1869年作為博格多·格根的轉世誕生，並成為複興的佛教蒙古帝國的理論和主權中心。1911年，清朝滅亡後，蒙古抓住機會宣布自治成爲博克多汗國。但是，儘管您為尋求國際認可和友誼所做的努力是不懈和高尚的，您的汗國卻是短暫的，您的統治很快就落入新成立的中華民國的勢力之下。 [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]堅定而虔誠的可汗啊！他的信仰和智慧可以追溯到幾個世紀以前，現在是重新確立蒙古獨立的時機了。妳能帶領妳的人民充滿信仰和幸福嗎？您能夠激勵那些在神聖而古老的方式中看到高貴品質的人嗎？妳能建立壹個經得起時間考驗的文明嗎？
祝妳們旅途平安，我是博克多格根額真汗，我向您伸出我族人的友誼之手。
只要妳們繼續走這條暴力道路，妳們就永遠不會得到和平。
我的人民朋友們會來的，妳們會遭到懲罰。
我向您伸出友誼之手，您願意和博克多汗國壹起公開發表友好宣言嗎？
您是這個世界上善良之人的威脅。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]他們公開譴責我們！注意：你們並未開戰。[ENDCOLOR])
妳背叛了我族人的情誼，這是絕不能原諒的！[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]他們公開譴責我們！注意：你們並未開戰。[ENDCOLOR])
有時候，我們必須掙紮求存，不是嗎？
拜託了，我的朋友，別搶占我們的土地了！
我只想與這個世界和平相處，我請求妳將妳的戰士移動到那些尋求戰爭的人那裡。
我的朋友，你能考慮一下嗎？
兩個好朋友之間不應該有邊界，拜託，妳不同意嗎？
身為朋友，我請求您不要購買我們的土地。
我的人民在受苦！作為朋友，我請求您的幫助。
我很慚愧帶給妳這洋的痛苦，我希望我們能及時修補我們的友誼。
很遺憾，我不能稱你為朋友。
當大先知產生時，同一大陸上的野蠻人單位會轉換成由你控制。有大先知駐守的城市每回合會將[ICON_PEACE]信仰轉換為文化邊界擴張。
隨著這位偉大先知的誕生，[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]野蠻人[ENDCOLOR]已加入您的國家！
這個單位是因大先知的感召而加入了您的帝國。
此城市的幸福度每增加1[ICON_HAPPINESS_1]點，信仰值增加1[ICON_PEACE]點。
獨具特色的蒙古活佛宮取代了神廟。與神廟不同的是，這座建築並沒有提供任何內在的[ICON_PEACE]信仰。相反，它會根據城市的[ICON_HAPPINESS_1]當地幸福度產生[ICON_PEACE]信念，它不需要任何維護費用。
博格德汗冬宮 (Winter Palace of the Bogd Khan) 或博格德汗宮博物館 (Bogd Khan Palace Museum) 是位於蒙古烏蘭巴托的博物館群。它曾是第八世博克多格根額真汗的綠宮，後來他被封為博格德汗或蒙古統治者。除了是最古老的博物館外，它也被認為是蒙古收藏最多的博物館之一。這座宮殿是博格德汗原來的四座府邸中僅存的一座。
大將軍的替代單位，在自己境內的領導獎勵加倍。當大先知出現時，每個轉換為您的野蠻人單位都會生成芒來巴特爾的點數。
芒來巴特爾是博克多汗國獨一無二的大將替代品。大將授予鄰近友方單位的標準[ICON_STRENGTH]戰鬥力加成，在友方國界內會加倍。此外，當大先知產生時，每個轉換為您所有的野蠻部隊都會產生 芒來巴特爾獎勵點數。
芒來巴特爾是博克多汗國獨一無二的大將替代品。大將授予鄰近友方單位的標準[ICON_STRENGTH]戰鬥力加成，在友方國界內會加倍。此外，當大先知產生時，每個轉換為您所有的野蠻部隊都會產生 芒來巴特爾獎勵點數。
在本國境內時，雙倍受惠於大將軍(芒來巴特爾)獎勵。
在本國境內時，雙倍受惠於大將軍(芒來巴特爾)獎勵。
哈丹巴特爾·馬克思爾扎布
古爾塞迪因·賽汗巴亞爾
